author: wn.com
title: Aurora Gang Member Sentenced to 20 Years in Federal Prison for Gun and Drug Crimes ...
text: ( Source : United States Attorney's Office for the District of Colorado ) DENVER - Michael Eugene Simpson , age 35, of Aurora, Colorado , was sentenced late last week to 240 months (20 years) in federal prison for gun and drug charges U.S.
